name: 蘇春𤂌
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意
瞭解原子結構乃是起碼的科技素養，本課程主要的目的是建立學生將來可以以X光作為研究工具的能力。本課程主要可分成四部份：一是結晶學原理、二是X光繞射的原理、三是X光繞射的基本應用、四是材料的結構分析。除此之外，並將進行一小部份實驗以驗證學理，同學可從實驗中學習檢驗製程中材料所發生問題，從而解決製造的問題。
schedule:
Week 1 & 2 Chap.1 Geometry of Crystal Structures
Week 3 & 4 Chap.2 The Nature of Diffraction
Week 5 & 6 Chap.3 Properties of Radiation Useful for Studying the Structure of Materials
Week 7 & 8 Chap.4 Recording the Diffraction Pattern
Week 9 (11/12)期中考試
Week 10 & 11 Chap.5 Crystal Symmetry and Diffraction Pattern
Week 12 & 13 Chap.6 Determination of Crystal Structures
Week 14 & 15 Chap.7 What Else Can We Learn from a Diffraction Experiment Besides the Average Structure?
Week 16 & 17 Chap.8 The Dynamical Theory of Diffraction
Week 18 (1/14)期末考試
materials:
Textbook: Diffraction from Materials, L. H. Schwartz and J. B. Cohen, Springer-Verlag, 1987
References:
1. J. M. Cowley, “Diffraction Physics”, North-Holland, 1981.
2. B. E. Warren, “X-Ray Diffraction”, Dover, 1969.
3. B. D. Cullity, “Elements of X-Ray Diffraction”, Addison-Wesley, 1978.
